attributes.action: Stop the EU from forcing Insurance Companies to cutting annuity payments by 20% through requiring them to hold more capital if they invest in corporate bonds.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Draft Solvency II rules in the EU will force Ins Co.s to hold more capital when they invest in corporate bonds as apart from govt bonds.  They will also require this extra cost be passed on to policyholders.  Resulting in 20% cut to annuity payments.  The govt which is meant to be against pensioner poverty should stand up to the EU on this one.  Its an attack on UK financial services and pensioners alike!
